vocabInfos.mediumDef:
1) to be weak, to droop, to languish, to be exhausted
1a) (Qal) pass participle (of the heart)
1a1) to be weak
1a2) to droop
1b) (Pulal)
1b1) to be or grow feeble
1b2) to languish
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 虛弱, 衰微
1a) (Qal) 虛弱 (被動分詞) (結16:30)
1b) (Pulal)
1b1) 衰弱或漸漸衰微
1b2) 變得無生氣
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 虚弱, 衰微
1a) (Qal) 虚弱 (被动分词) (结16:30)
1b) (Pulal)
1b1) 衰弱或渐渐衰微
1b2) 变得无生气
